  59. ‌#define ngx_rbt_red(node)               ((node)->color = 1)
  60. ‌#define ngx_rbt_black(node)             ((node)->color = 0)
  61. ‌#define ngx_rbt_is_red(node)            ((node)->color)
  62. ‌#define ngx_rbt_is_black(node)          (!ngx_rbt_is_red(node))
  63. ‌#define ngx_rbt_copy_color(n1, n2)      (n1->color = n2->color)


  66. /* a sentinel must be black */

  68. ‌#define ngx_rbtree_sentinel_init(node)  ngx_rbt_black(node)


  71. static ngx_inline ngx_rbtree_node_t *
  72. ‌ngx_rbtree_min(ngx_rbtree_node_t *node, ngx_rbtree_node_t *sentinel)
  73. {
  74.     while (node->left != sentinel) {
  75.         node = node->left;
  76.     }

  78.     return node;
  79. }
